history.proof: intros h st src t r st' Hhandle. unfold handleRequestVoteReply in Hhandle. unfold update_elections_data_requestVoteReply. destruct (currentTerm (snd st) <? t) eqn:H_currentTerm_lt_t. - hauto q: on depth: 3. - destruct (t <? currentTerm (snd st)) eqn:H_t_lt_currentTerm. + hauto q: on depth: 3. + destruct (r && wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (src :: votesReceived (snd st)))) eqn:H_vote_granted. * qsimpl. * qsimpl.

original: intros h st src t r st' Hhandle. unfold handleRequestVoteReply in Hhandle. unfold update_elections_data_requestVoteReply. destruct (currentTerm (snd st) <? t) eqn:H_currentTerm_lt_t. - simpl. auto. - destruct (t <? currentTerm (snd st)) eqn:H_t_lt_currentTerm. + simpl. auto. + destruct (r && wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (src :: votesReceived (snd st)))) eqn:H_vote_granted. * rewrite Hhandle. simpl. reflexivity. * rewrite Hhandle. simpl. reflexivity.
